downfall:WorldOfGoo.NAME: World of Goo
downfall:WorldOfGoo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage, add a Slimed Status to your discard pile.

downfall:Hexed.NAME: Hexed
downfall:Hexed.DESCRIPTION: Start with a Velvet Choker. When you draw a card, it becomes Ethereal.

downfall:Jewelcrafting.NAME: Jewelcrafting
downfall:Jewelcrafting.DESCRIPTION: Start with two copies of Exploit Gem and a Pick of Rhapsody.

downfall:ChampStances.NAME: New Challenger
downfall:ChampStances.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat in a random Champ stance, and gain a Finishing Strike. All starter cards gain Technique.

downfall:Enraging.NAME: Last Stand
downfall:Enraging.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain Strength and cleanse debuffs on their next turn when reduced to 50% HP.

downfall:Analytical.NAME: Analytical
downfall:Analytical.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain a random card with Encode and give it Ethereal. Basic Strikes and Defends Encode.

downfall:StatusAbuse.NAME: Inflicted
downfall:StatusAbuse.DESCRIPTION: Start with a Makeshift Battery, Donu's Washers, Deca's Washers, a Medical Kit, and a Bronze Idol. All other Relics are replaced with Circlets.

downfall:TooManyShivs.NAME: Too Many Shivs
downfall:TooManyShivs.DESCRIPTION: Start with Velvet Choker, Void Essence, and 10 Shivs.

downfall:Wizzardry.NAME: Wizzardry
downfall:Wizzardry.DESCRIPTION: Start with a Wizard Hat, a Wizard Staff, and an Upgraded copy of Wizardry.

downfall:TransformRewards.NAME: Transformed
downfall:TransformRewards.DESCRIPTION: All card rewards become "Transform a card".
